plot: With 12 hours left before the closing of the lottery ticket sales, a filmmaker follows a homeless man obsessed with numbers who comes up with a formula to win the £110 million jackpot.
title: Luck
plot_es: With 12 hours left before the closing of the lottery ticket sales, a filmmaker follows a homeless man obsessed with numbers who comes up with a formula to win the £110 million jackpot.
plot_en: With 12 hours left before the closing of the lottery ticket sales, a filmmaker follows a homeless man obsessed with numbers who comes up with a formula to win the £110 million jackpot.
